attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2017-0815

Date: 2017-06-20

Whereas the District of Donnelly Board of Trade, in Alberta, the certificate of formation of which was recorded pursuant to the Boards of Trade Act, on June 21, 1927, has ceased to exercise its franchises;

 

Therefore, His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Industry, pursuant to section 43 of the Boards of Trade Act, dissolves the District of Donnelly Board of Trade.


 

Attendu que la District of Donnelly Board of Trade (Alberta), dont le certificat de constitution a été enregistré en vertu de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce le 21 juin 1927, a cessé d’exercer ses pouvoirs,

 

À ces causes, sur recommandation du ministre de l’Industrie et en vertu de l’article 43 de la Loi sur les chambres de commerce, Son Excellence le Gouverneur général en conseil dissout la District of Donnelly Board of Trade.
